title: Zombie Girl - The Movie [DVDR 2009 zombie movie documentary + fe
description:
DVDR
2009
English Audio
No Subtitles

This is a great documentary, following twelve-year-old Emily on her journey to make a zombie flick. I wanted to upload the full DVD because it offers the final product and fruits of her labor -- Pathogen -- as a special feature. And after watching the documentary, you are pretty curious as to how the finished product turned out.

"An excellent documentary!" -Ain't It Cool News
"ZOMBIE GIRL has raw passion and real spirit." -L.A. Weekly


Plot (from the back of the DVD): 

Emily Hagins is making a zombie movie. It's feature-length, it's bloody, and the zombies don't run -- just like it should be. But there's one difference between her film and every other zombie movie you've ever seen: Emily is twelve.
Emily is part of a new generation of teenagers raised on technology and expressing themselves through video. Only -- she's doing it on a feature-length scale!
Emily has the vision and her mom has the driver's license. Together, their journy is a fascinating look at a growing world of young moviemakers and the bloodiest mother/daughter story you've ever seen.


Special Features:

Pathogen -- Emily's feature-length zombie movie (68 minutes)
Q&A with the cast & crew of Pathogen at its world premiere
A behind-the-scenes look at the making of Emily's second feature film, The Retelling
Emily reflects on lessons learned from Pathogen as she prepares for her third movie
Original theatrical trailer for Zombie Girl: The Movie
